title: 任意1.8客户端进入多人游戏崩溃
author: 智障惠恩233
txt_content:
使用任何1.8客户端进入多人游戏会崩溃
没有报错 只有LOG
[19:33:34] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: 苦笑的京都ZZ
[19:33:37] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[19:33:41] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default, FMLFileResourcePack:Forge Mod Loader, FMLFileResourcePack:Minecraft Forge, MotolSinn PVP 512x blue V4.0.zip
[19:33:41] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[19:33:41] [Thread-9/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
[19:33:41] [Thread-9/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
[19:33:42] [Thread-9/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[19:33:42] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[19:33:45] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 16x16 textures-atlas
[19:33:46] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default, FMLFileResourcePack:Forge Mod Loader, FMLFileResourcePack:Minecraft Forge, MotolSinn PVP 512x blue V4.0.zip
[19:33:47] [Client thread/INFO]: SoundSystem shutting down...
[19:33:47] [Client thread/WARN]: Author: Paul Lamb, www.paulscode.com
[19:33:47] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[19:33:47] [Thread-11/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
[19:33:47] [Thread-11/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
[19:33:47] [Thread-11/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[19:33:47] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[19:33:50] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 4096x2048 textures-atlas

有点迷啊 哪位大佬可以帮忙看看。。

replies.author: 很咸的咸鱼
replies.txt_content:
要不您把 这个id换下试试？
改成英文的？ 
[19:33:34] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: 苦笑的京都ZZ
我只看到了这个 如果不对 勿喷。

replies.author: 白狐苏悦
replies.txt_content: 换成英语试一试 日志看不出什么
